translations: 侦察；勘察（reconnoiter 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: The development of different period mineral reconnoitering and exploitation of our country is reviewed…
sentences.translation: 对我国不同时期的矿产资源开发利用工作进行了回顾。

sentences.sentence: Reconnoitering and receiving the wideband radio signal is an important research content of electronic warfare.
sentences.translation: 宽带无线电信号的侦察机接收，是电子对抗的重要研究内容。

sentences.sentence: At the same time I and young lady are dull, on the reconnoitering screen the innumerable light spots are flashing.
sentences.translation: 我和小姐也同时一呆，侦察屏幕上有无数亮点在闪动。
